backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, visa records, and application status management with access control and normalization utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and tests with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing the root element and loading the Vite React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component handling routing, authentication states, profile setup, and global error boundaries.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: React error boundary showing a user-friendly fallback card and logging errors to the console.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper that renders a header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying copyright, attribution, and a link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, login/logout handling, user avatar display, and hashâ€‘based route controls.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting authenticated users to enter and save their name on first login.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Component for adding, removing, and displaying preset or custom reminder timestamps for a visa expiry date.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Upcomi: Fetches upcoming reminders, determines overdue status, and displays them in a sorted list with contextual badges.
frontend/src/components/status/Applicati: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of application status records with file upload and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/visa/VisaRecordF: Form for creating or editing visa records, including expiry dates, conditions, and reminder management.
frontend/src/components/visa/VisaRecordL: Displays all visa records with expiry indicators and allows editing or deleting individual entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlobObjectUrl.ts: Generates and cleans up object URLs from binary data for displaying files like PDFs.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Simple hash-based router that tracks and updates the current route based on URL hash changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, visa records, reminders, and application status through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up TailwindCSS base layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AustralianVisaCheckPa: Implements a form-driven page to check visa application status and display results, including PDF viewing and downloading.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Provides a tabbed dashboard for managing visa records, reminders, and application status entries with create/edit functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the marketing landing page with login and visa status check entry points.
frontend/src/utils/applicationStatusNorm: Normalizes application ID and email inputs to consistent trimmed and lowercase values for backend lookups.
frontend/src/utils/getApplicationStatusR: Normalizes varied backend response shapes into a clean ApplicationStatus or null.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL hashes. Supports both standard and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, spacing, typography, animations, and plugins with extended design tokens. Enables dark mode, container settings, and custom utilities.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking versioned requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features. Highlights ongoing bugs related to the Australian Visa Check lookup.
